snippet: A Japanese government study has found that nearly a third of working women who responded to a survey reported being sexually harassed on the job.
lead_paragraph: A Japanese government study has found that nearly a third of working women who responded to a survey reported being sexually harassed on the job.

headline.main: Japan: Survey of Working Women Says Sexual Harassment Is Widespread
headline.print_headline: Japan: Survey of Working Women Says Sexual Harassment Is Widespread
